title: Is the Middle Class within Reach for Middle-Income Families?
content: Note:  Loan values are not seasonally adjusted and are reported in 2018 dollars using personal consumption expenditures prices.     Source:  Federal Reserve Board, Student Loans Owned and Securitized, Outstanding, retrieved from FRED, Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis;  Bureau of Economic Analysis; calculations by Board staff.  0  200  400  600  800  1,000  1,200  1,400  1,600  1,800  2006:Q1 2008:Q1 2010:Q1 2012:Q1 2014:Q1 2016:Q1 2018:Q1  Figure 11.
